snippet: He served as editor of The Cincinnati Enquirer when it renounced articles questioning the business practices of the Chiquita banana company in Central America.
lead_paragraph: He served as editor of The Cincinnati Enquirer when it renounced articles questioning the business practices of the Chiquita banana company in Central America.

headline.seo: Lawrence Beaupre, Editor for Chiquita News Articles, Dies at 68
headline.main: Lawrence Beaupre, Editor for Chiquita Articles, Dies at 68
headline.print_headline: Lawrence Beaupre, 68, Editor for Chiquita Articles
